title: 92/103/EEC: Commission Decision of 31 January 1992 amending for the third time Decision 80/775/EEC, on laying down methods of control for maintaining the officially brucellosis-free status of bovine herds in certain regions of the Federal Republic of Germany (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 31 January 1992  amending for the third time Decision 80/775/EEC, on laying down methods of control for maintaining the officially brucellosis-free status of bovine herds in certain regions of the Federal Republic of  Germany  (Only the German text is authentic)  (92/103/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Commission Decision 80/775/EEC, 'Berlin, Brandenburg, Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, Saxony, Saxony-Anhalt, Thuringia' is added after 'Bremen' and 'Berlin (West)' is removed.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 January 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64. (2) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29. (3) OJ No L 224, 27. 8. 1980, p. 14. (4) OJ No L 16, 20. 1. 1990, p. 34.
